page.title: 14CARDROSS _ EMPLOYMENT
page.content: SEASONAL WORK ON LOCAL FARMS, SELF- EMPLOYMENT OR THE LOCAL PRIMARY SCHOOL OFFER THE ONLY JOB OPPORTUNITIES IN THIS SECTION. MANY OF THE RESIDENTS ARE RETIRED AND COMMUTERS TRAVELLING TO GLASGOW, HELENSBURGH, DUMBARTON AND THE VALE OF LEVEN ACCOUNT FOR MOST OF THE WORKING POPULATION. THE MINISTRY OF DEFENCE AT FASLANE AND COULPORT IS ALSO A SOURCE OF EMPLOYMENT AND THERE ARE SEVERAL NAVAL FAMILIES. THE LEGAL, DENTAL, MEDICAL, SURVEYING AND EDUCATIONAL PROFESSIONS ARE ALL WELL-REPRESENTED.
